text:
<VirtualHost *:8080>
  ServerName rails
  DocumentRoot "c:/web/rubyonrails/blog/" 
  <Directory "c:/web/rubyonrails/blog/public/">
    Options ExecCGI FollowSymLinks
    AllowOverride all
    Allow from all
    Order allow,deny
    AddHandler cgi-script .cgi
    AddHandler fastcgi-script .fcgi
  </Directory>
</VirtualHost>
